import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;
//import java.util.StringTokenizer;

class CodeTheMessage {

	public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException{
		BufferedReader br=new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
		int T=Integer.parseInt(br.readLine());
		char[] s;
		//int c;
		//StringTokenizer st;
		StringBuilder ans;
		for (int i = 0; i < T; i++) {
			//st=new StringTokenizer(br.readLine());
			s=br.readLine().toCharArray();
			ans=new StringBuilder();
			/*while(st.hasMoreTokens()){
				s=st.nextToken().toCharArray();
				int j;
				for (j = 0; j < s.length-1; j++) {
					count=(int)s[j]-97;
					ans.append(count*count).append('-');
				}
				count=(int)s[j]-97;
				ans.append(count*count);
				ans.append('$');
			}
			ans.deleteCharAt(ans.length()-1);
			System.out.println(ans);*/
			ans.append(((int)s[0]-97)*((int)s[0]-97));
			for (int j = 1; j < s.length; j++) {
				if(s[j]==' ')
					ans.append('$');
				else{
					if(s[j-1]==' ')
						ans.append(((int)s[j]-97)*((int)s[j]-97));
					else
						ans.append('-').append(((int)s[j]-97)*((int)s[j]-97));
				}
			}
			System.out.println(ans);
		}
	}

}
